data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Rayong, Thailand.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Rayong, Thailand
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Rayong.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Rayong, Thailand, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Rayong
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Han Chinese, Min Bei people. 2.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Lord, use Google search to lead people in Rayong, Thailand to the gospel today.
Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Rayong, Thailand that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 3,757 believers in Rayong and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.
